about_the_game:
Think you can master the ancient art of veggie kung-fu?

This demo is a pre-alpha version of Frozen Injustice. Its purpose is to let you experience the core movement and platforming mechanics.
We still have a long way to go, and we hope to have your support along the journey. Can you beat your best time?

Frozen Injustice: Fridge Adventures is a game that brings out the best aspects of the action-platformer genre, creating a unique and enjoyable experience.

You are Broco-Lee, a trainee from Master Turnip-Man’s Kung Fu Dojo, who, after completing his training, must use his cleaning powers to save the Refrigerator from the dreaded bacteria that are invading it.


To fulfill your mission, you will need to fight bacteria, clean areas, and rescue innocent vegetables. Explore the different floors of the Fridge and solve the mystery that is infecting it.

You’ll meet colorful characters who will accompany you on your adventure, along with all the vegetables you’ll save as you clean the areas. The more vegetables you rescue, the more allies you will have in this battle.

Free the refrigerator from bacteria as you punch, kick, and clean your way through the floors in this platformer, adventure, and action game

short_description: Clean, fight, and save the fridge in this action-adventure platformer with classic 3D platforming gameplay! Play as Broco-Lee, a Kung Fu trainee, as you battle bacteria, rescue vegetables, and uncover mysteries across the fridge’s floors. Join the dojo and become the hero this epic adventure needs!
